languages.text: "Некоторые слова необходимо услышать хоть раз, чтобы в них поверить".
"Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."
languages.original_text: "Некоторые слова необходимо услышать хоть раз, чтобы в них поверить".

traits.locale_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe in them."
"Some words you need to hear at least once to believe in them."
"Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."
"Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."
"Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

languages.text: “有些话至少要先听过一次才能相信。”
languages.original_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

traits.locale_text: “有些话至少要先听过一次才能相信。”

languages.text: «Algunas palabras hay que oírlas al menos una vez para creerlas».
languages.original_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

traits.locale_text: «Algunas palabras hay que oírlas al menos una vez para creerlas».

languages.text: « Il y a des mots qu'il faut entendre au moins une fois pour pouvoir y croire. »
languages.original_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a des mots qu'il faut entendre au moins une fois pour pouvoir y croire. »

languages.text: "Manche Worte muss man zumindest einmal hören, um sie zu glauben."
languages.original_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

traits.locale_text: "Manche Worte muss man zumindest einmal hören, um sie zu glauben."

languages.text: 「少なくとも一度は聞かないと信じられない言葉もある」
languages.original_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも一度は聞かないと信じられない言葉もある」

languages.text: "Bazı sözlere inanmak için onları en azından bir kez duyman gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Some words you need to hear at least once to believe them."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı sözlere inanmak için onları en azından bir kez duyman gerekir."
